summary: sweat chloride test, NPD, and ICM were performed in 18 patients with CF (sweat chloride >60 mmol/l), including 6 pancreatic sufficient (PS) patients and 13 healthy controls, including 8 smokers. smokers have decreased CFTR response measured by NPD (p = 0.049) electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. supplementary material 12890_2014_596_MOESM1_ESM.zip (26.3KB, zip) Additional file 1: Correlation of the best and average 0Cl - + Iso (NPD)
